# Documentation

Online documentation for my R packages. Click on the names for links to the full documentation.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(results="asis")
```

## Packages:

```{r folder-names, include=FALSE}
library(stringr)
library(pander)
library(cranlogs)
library(dplyr)

panderOptions('knitr.auto.asis', FALSE)

folders <- list.dirs(recursive = FALSE)
folders <- folders[!(folders %in% c("./tools", "./R", "./reference",
                                    "./inst",  "./man", "./index_files",
                                    "./img", "./.git", "./.Rproj.user",
                                    "./emisc", "./docs"))]

folders <- str_replace_all(folders, "./", "")

folders <- tibble::tibble(folders = folders, downloads = NA)

for (i in seq_along(folders$folders)) {
  folders$downloads[[i]] <- sum(
    cran_downloads(folders$folders[[i]], "last-month")$count
    )
}

folders <- folders %>% arrange(desc(downloads))

folders2 <- paste0("[`", folders$folders,
                   "`](https://docs.evanodell.com/", folders$folders, ")")

license <- c()
descr <- c()
doi <- c()

for (i in seq_along(folders$folders)) {
## License types
desc1 <- packageDescription(folders$folders[[i]])

if(desc1$License  == "MIT + file LICENSE") {
  license[i] <- paste0("[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg)](https://github.com/EvanOdell/", folders$folders[[i]], "/blob/master/LICENSE.md)")
  } else {
  license[i] <- "[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)"
  }
## Description

desc1 <- packageDescription(folders$folders[[i]])

descr[i] <- str_squish(desc1$Description)

doi1 <- citation(folders$folders[[i]])

doi[i] <-  paste0("[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/", doi1[1]$doi,
                  ".svg)](https://doi.org/", doi1[1]$doi, ")")

}

cran_status <- paste0(
  "[![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/", folders$folders,
  ")](https://cran.r-project.org/package=", folders$folders, ")")

github_status <- paste0(
  "[![GitHub tag](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/evanodell/", folders$folders,
  ".svg)](https://github.com/evanodell/", folders$folders, ")")

downloads <- paste0(
  "[![](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/", folders$folders,
  ")](https://cran.r-project.org/package=", folders$folders, ")")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}

for (i in seq_along(folders$folders)) {
  cat(pandoc.header.return(folders2[[i]], level = 3), "\n")

  cat(pander(cran_status[[i]]))
  cat(pander(license[[i]]))
  cat(pander(github_status[[i]]))
  cat(pander(downloads[[i]]))
  cat(pander(doi[[i]]), "\n\n")
  cat(pander(descr[[i]]), "\n")
  
}
```

### [`emisc`](https://docs.evanodell.com/emisc)

[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg)](https://github.com/EvanOdell/emisc/blob/master/LICENSE)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/emisc)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=emisc)
[![GitHub tag](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/evanodell/emisc.svg)](https://github.com/evanodell/emisc)
[![](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/emisc)](https://dgrtwo.shinyapps.io/cranview/)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/96876145.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/96876145)

`emisc` is a collection of miscellaneous functions that I have made that may or may not be useful, and that may or may not duplicate existing work.

`emisc` is currently not available on CRAN. You can install `emisc` from github with:

```
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("evanodell/emisc")
```
